enemyTemplates.Name: Goblin
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Goblin flings a clever trap, ensnaring its foe.

enemyTemplates.Name: Orc
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Orc charges with overwhelming force, stunning its enemy.

enemyTemplates.Name: Dragon
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Dragon breathes a searing flame, engulfing everything in its path.

enemyTemplates.Name: Sorcerer
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Sorcerer casts a dark spell, crippling its adversary.

enemyTemplates.Name: Elemental
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Elemental unleashes its fury, summoning a storm to ravage its foes.
